title: Of Mice & Men [Blu-ray]
description: Of Mice And Men, John Steinbeck's beloved novella (adapted for the screen by renowned playwright Horton Foote, Trip To Bountiful, Convicts) comes to the screen under the direction of actor/director Gary Sinise (Forrest Gump), and brought vividly to life by John Malkovich (Being John Malkovich) as Lennie, Ray Walston (Kiss Me, Stupid) as Candy, Joe Morton (Speed) as Crooks, Casey Siemaszko (Back To The Future) as Curly, and Sherilyn Fenn (Fatal Instinct) as Curly's sultry wife.
store: Joe Morton  (Actor),     John Malkovich  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
